thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 12 of 265
thread.title: Diane

author: Diane
title: Diane
text: I really like Hello Fresh. Compared to other food delivery services, Hello Fresh has a healthier menu, and the food arrives packaged for easy storage in your refrigerator. The only drawback is the inability to adjust the menu items. Certain dishes are so good that I would like to eat them again, but they are only offered once; some weeks can be disappointing if you are not satisfied with the menu for a particular week.
